name: The Dicenomicon: Starter
description:
A starter set for The Dicenomicon for OS X - just rolling dice, no formulas, but all the rich physics simulation and fun.

Features the standard set of FRP dice (d4, d6, d8, d10, d12, d20, d%), with customizable:
- Dice set colors
- Dice textures
- Background
- UI Theme

Roll your dice, get the total - a quick click or menu key to add more.

Individual dice can also be held (so as to not roll when the rest are rolled), ignored from the total, rerolled, or deleted.
